name: Pancit Palabok
description: Pancit Palabok uses thin rice noodles topped with a thick, golden-orange sauce made from shrimp broth and annatto seeds. It is garnished with a variety of toppings including crushed chicharon (pork rinds), tinapa (smoked fish flakes), hard-boiled eggs, and scallions. It has a rich, savory seafood flavor.
